newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Morocco cuts weekly repo rate 0.5 point to 6.5 pct.
newsitem.headline: Morocco cuts weekly repo rate 0.5 point to 6.5 pct.

text.p: Morocco's Bank al-Maghrib (central bank) said it was cutting the interest rate for its weekly repurchase agreement by half a point to 6.5 percent.
The new rate was effective from November 7, 1996, a bank official said on Friday.
"The decision to cut the Repo interest rate aims also to encourage banks to reduce interbank money market rates and boost business," the official said.
